author: Dan Wang
title: Life After COVID: The View from Beijing
description: The Chinese lockdown has been “astounding, unprecedented, and medieval.” What does a normalcy even look like afterwards?
content: One day early in February, I stepped out of my apartment building to find that a security guard had set up a desk and pitched a tent. He was, he told me, to take every residents temperature as we went in and out. It was easy to walk around his tent, so I igno… [+22641 chars]
